div.bibl: Lietuva, June 24, 1910. [THE LAISVOJI MINTIS IS PUBLISHED]

body.p: Beginning with its next number, the Laisvoji Mintis will be published in Chicago. It will be printed by the Lietuva Press. We are not mistaken when we call this periodical the best Lithuanian monthly magazine of all those that we have because of the importance and sincerity of the articles contained in it. However, the Lithuanians should not forget that the publication of such a periodical is costly, therefore, its life and prosperity will depend not only on compliments but more on support.
